gacchatas tiṣṭhataḥgacchatā tiṣṭhatā kāryaṃkāryāmkāya ujjāy(y)ākhyaṃ tuujjāyaḥravyakuru vikhyāta kumbhakamkumbhakaḥ//\\!

yoginīcakrasāmānyaḥcakrasāmānyacakrasaṃmānyaḥcakram āsādyacakrasevyas tu sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārakaḥ/\\+
na kṣudhā na tṛṣā nidrā naivālasyaṃ prajāyatetu jāyatetu jāyete//\\!
bhavet svacchandasattvaṃ cadehas tudehasyadehaś cadehaṃ ca sarvopadravavarjitaḥvivarjitaḥ/\\+
anena vidhinā satyaṃnityaṃyas tu yogīndroyogiṃdroyogeṃdro bhūmibhuvimunimaṇḍale//\\!

lg.l: ūrvor upari ced dhattevai dhattesaṃdhattesaṃsthāpya ubheśubhe pādatale tathāyadāsadāubhe/\\+

mukhaṃsukhaṃ saṃyamyasaṃjamya yatnena prāṇaṃghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena recayet//J10 adds here: athaiva svaśarīrasthaṃ cālayet pavanaṃ sthalī (cf. ab with the reading of V3 sthalī for dhiyā).\\!
yathāyadā lagatigalati hṛtkaṇṭhehṛkaṃṭhaṃhṛtkaṇṭha kapālekapālakapālā°kapole sasvanaṃ tataḥśvasanaṃ tataḥsvāsanaṃ tataḥca samantataḥsyarśanaṃ tataḥ°vadhi sasvanaṃ°vadhi niḥsvanaṃ°vadhi pūrayet/\\+
vegena pūrayet kiṃcitsamyakcāpi hṛtsyāttpadmāvadhi mārutammārutaḥkevalaṃ//\\!
punar virecayetvirecanaṃt tadvat pūrayec capūrayed vāpūrayitvāpūraïtvā punaḥ punaḥpunas tataḥ/\\+
yathaiva lohakārāṇāṃkāreṇa bhastrā vegena cālyate//\\!
tathaiva svaśarīrasthaṃsthaś cālayetcāyetcālyatet pavanaṃ sudhīḥdhiyāśanaiḥsthalī/\\+
yadāyathātathā śramokramo bhaved dehe tadātathā sūryeṇa pūrayetrecayet//\\!
yathodaraṃathodaraṃ bhavetlabhetyadāt pūrṇaṃ pavanenaanilena tathātadāyathā laghulaghuḥ/\\+
dhārayendhāvayendhārayann nāsikāṃnāmikāṃnāsikā madhyāmādhyātmadhyāṃmadhyaṃmadhyetarjanībhyāṃtarjanabhyāṃaṅgulībhyāṃ vinātathā dṛḍham//\\!

vātapittaśleṣmaharaṃ śarīrāgnivivardhanampravardhanamvivajitaṃ//\\!
kuṇḍalībodhakaṃbodhakaḥbodhanaṃ vajraṃcakraṃviprasarvakṣipraṃkuryātkartturkumbho pāpaghnaṃpāpapuṃpavanaṃbhavaghnaṃbhāvaghnaṃrogaghnaḥdoṣaghnaṃ sukhadaṃsukhadaḥ śubhamśubhaḥhitaṃtathā/\\+
brahmanāḍīmukhe saṃsthamukhe saṃsthaḥmukhe saṃsthaṃsukhe saṃsthaṃmukhaṃtasthamukhāṃtatsthakaphādyargalakaphaughagalakapāṭergalanāśanamnāśanaḥ//\\!

ārecyāpūrya yat kuryātārecyāpūrya yaḥ kuryātrecayet pūrakaṃ kuryātrecakaṃ pūrakaṃ kuryātrecakaḥ pūrakaḥ kāryarecakaḥ pūrakaḥ kāryaṃrecakaḥ pūrakaṃ kāryaṃrecakaḥ pūrvavat kāryaḥvirecya pūrakaḥ kāryaḥ sa vaiśanaiḥ sahitakumbhakaḥsaṃyatakuṃbhakaḥ/ ab omitted in P15,Jyo\\+
yāvat kevalasiddhiḥśuddhiḥ syāt tāvat sahitamtāvat sahitasamsahitaṃ tāvadm abhyaset//\\!
recakaṃ pūrakaṃkuṃbhakaṃ muktvāmuktaṃtyaktvā sukhaṃmukhaṃsukhād yad vāyudhāraṇamyad vāyudhāraṇātvāyunirodhanamsaṃdhāya dhāraṇāṃ/\\+
prāṇāyāmo'yam ity uktaḥ sa vaisarvaiḥsarve kevalakumbhakaḥkumbhataḥ//\\!
kevale kumbhakekumbhake kevalekumbhakaḥ kevale siddhesiddhosiddhi recarecaḥrecakapūrakapūrapūrevarjitevivarjitevivarjitaṃvivarjayet/\\+
na tasya durlabhaṃdurlabha kiṃcit triṣu lokeṣukāleṣu vidyate//\\!
śaktaḥsaktaṃśuddhaśuddhaḥ kevalakumbhenakevale kumbhake yatheṣṭaṃyatheṣṭayathoktaṃ vāyudhāraṇamdhāraṇedhāraṇāt/\\+
rājayogayogaṃpadaṃphalaṃ caivacaivaṃcāpisamyak labhatelabhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ//\\!
haṭhaṃ vinā rājayogo rājayogaṃ vinā haṭhaḥ/\\+
na sidhyati tato yugmamyogamm ā niṣpatteḥniṣpatteḥaniṣpattiubhayor api samabhyasetcābhyaset//\\!

kumbhakād vardhate vāyus tato'gniś ca pravardhatepavardhate/\\+
buddhābuddhvā kuṇḍalinī tasmāt saiva dvāraṃ prayacchati// Gr2\\!
found before 2.77kumbhakātkumbhakānt kuṇḍalībodhaḥbodhaṃbodhaubodho kuṇḍalībodhatobodhito bhavet/\\+
anargalāanargalaanirgalā suṣumṇā casukhāmnā casuṣumṇātosukhumnātosuṣumṇāyāṃ ante haṭhasiddhi add.viśed vāyus tato balāt haṭhasiddhiś ca jāyateprajāyate//\\!
